page.title: 13Underwood
page.content: The primary school in Underwood is called the C of E school.There's the old people's home,situated on Desmond Court,Doctors Surgery which is run by Dr J.Sirur,there is a post office in the village selling all basic GPO goods such as stamps and cards. There is a fish and chips shop (Walkers) which is situated near Daf Trucks. In Underwood there are at least 6 shops spread over the whole of the village, there is a greengrocers , newsagents and a butchers shop.There is also a warehouse called Advanced Components Ltd which distributes electrical components to other electrical firms. There are four pubs in Underwood called the Brick and Tile,Hole in the Wall,Sandhills and the Miners Welfare.
